name: Jean Reno
info:
• 简体中文名: 让·雷诺
  • 别名: Juan Moreno y Herrera-Jiménez
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1948-07-30
  • 血型: O型
  • 身高: 191cm
  • Born: Casablanca, Morocco
  • Years active: 1977–present

detail:
Juan Moreno y Herrera-Jiménez, known as Jean Reno (French pronunciation: ​[ʒɑ̃ ʁeno]), is a French actor. Working in French, English, Japanese, Spanish, and Italian, he has appeared in numerous successful films such as Crimson Rivers, Godzilla, The Da Vinci Code, Mission: Impossible, The Pink Panther, Ronin, Les visiteurs, The Big Blue, and Léon: The Professional.

让·雷诺，1948年7月30日出生于摩洛哥卡萨布兰卡，西班牙裔法国演员。

works.name: Léon: The Professional / 这个杀手不太冷
